get.description: Get a list of repository commits in a project.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: ref_name
parameters.description: The name of a repository branch, tag or revision range, or if not given the default branch

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only commits after or on this date are returned in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Only commits before or on this date are returned in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The file path

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Retrieve every commit from the repository

parameters.name: with_stats
parameters.description: Stats about each commit are added to the response

parameters.name: first_parent
parameters.description: Follow only the first parent commit upon seeing a merge commit

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: List commits in order. Possible values: default, topo. Defaults to default, the commits are shown in reverse chronological order.

parameters.name: trailers
parameters.description: Parse and include Git trailers for every commit

post.summary: Create a commit with multiple files and actions
post.description: Create a commit by posting a JSON payload

get.description: Get a specific commit identified by the commit hash or name of a branch or tag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit hash or name of a repository branch or tag

parameters.name: stats
parameters.description: Include commit stats. Default is true

get.summary: Get references a commit is pushed to

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit hash

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The scope of commits. Possible values branch, tag, all. Default is all.

post.description: Cherry-picks a commit to a given branch.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit hash

post.description: Reverts a commit in a given branch.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: Commit SHA to revert

get.summary: Get the diff of a commit
get.description: Get the diff of a commit in a project.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit hash or name of a repository branch or tag

get.summary: Get the comments of a commit
get.description: Get the comments of a commit in a project.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit hash or name of a repository branch or tag

post.description: Adds a comment to a commit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit SHA or name of a repository branch or tag

get.summary: Get the discussions of a commit
get.description: Get the discussions of a commit in a project.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit hash or name of a repository branch or tag

get.summary: List the statuses of a commit

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit SHA

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: The name of a repository branch or tag or, if not given, the default branch

parameters.name: stage
parameters.description: Filter by build stage, for example, test

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by job name, for example, bundler:audit

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Return all statuses, not only the latest ones

post.summary: Post the build status to a commit
post.description: Adds or updates a build status of a commit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit SHA

get.summary: List merge requests associated with a commit
get.description: Get a list of merge requests related to the specified commit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit SHA

get.summary: Get GPG signature of a commit
get.description: Get the GPG signature from a commit, if it is signed. For unsigned commits, it results in a 404 response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The commit hash or name of a repository branch or tag
